doc:
John Challis https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Challis 0 John Challis (born 16 August 1942) is an English actor best known for portraying Aubrey "Boycie" Boyce in the long-running BBC television comedy series Only Fools and Horses and its sequel/spin-off The Green Green Grass. Since 2015, he has made guest appearances as "Monty Staines" from the seventh series onwards in the hit ITV comedy Benidorm, later becoming a regular from series 10 in 2018. John_Challis ( born_16_August_1942 ) is an_English_actor best_known for portraying Aubrey_"_Boycie_"_Boyce in the_long-running_BBC_television_comedy_series_Only_Fools_and_Horses and its_sequel/spin-off The_Green_Green_Grass . Since 2015 , he has_made guest_appearances as "_Monty_Staines " from the_seventh_series_onwards in the_hit_ITV_comedy_Benidorm , later becoming a_regular from series_10 in 2018 .
